title: Cannot migrate to SQL, default behavior now loads from SQL
author: steveballantyne
body_snippet:
I am running Nightly 1.77.3 (b1784).

I am trying to mirgate my connections from the stable branch. The old behavior to make that transition is described here: https://mremoteng.readthedocs.io/en/latest/sql_configuration.html

The issue is that once you have configured a SQL server and click OK, or Apply, the application automatically loads the connections from SQL. This doesn't allow me the opportunity to click File > Save Connections File, which would normally store all of my connections i...

comments.author: simonai1254
comments.snippet: 1.77.3-nb has saving of the settings disabled for development reasons. Use 1.77.2-nb until 1.77.4-nb is out. See e.g., #2245
